title: Make Seller Dashboard overflow menu dropdown background white

requirements.text: Update the Seller Dashboard three-dot (overflow) menu dropdown so the menu options render on a white background with appropriate contrast (readable text/icons) and a subtle border/shadow, without changing the menu items, routes, or logout behavior.

quotes: থ্রি ডট মেনুর অপশন গুলোর পিছন সাদা কলার করে দিন

acceptanceCriteria: In /seller-dashboard, opening the three-dot overflow menu shows a dropdown panel with a white background (not transparent/dark).
Menu item labels and icons remain readable against the white background in both light and dark app themes.
Dropdown panel has a subtle border and/or shadow consistent with the app design system and remains aligned to the trigger (no positioning regressions).

Existing menu items and behaviors remain unchanged: Store Settings navigates to /create-store, View Store navigates to /store/$supplierId, and Logout triggers the existing Internet Identity logout + query cache clear + cart clear + navigates to /.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components); implement styling via composition/props/classes in app-owned components such as frontend/src/components/seller/SellerDashboardOverflowMenu.tsx.
nonGoals: Do not add or remove overflow menu items.
Do not change navigation, authentication, or logout logic.
Do not redesign the Seller Dashboard top bar beyond the overflow menu dropdown styling.
